name: Elwood (aphrodites'Moon)
description:
This magical tree, which named Elwood, slowly started to die. As Alder started to realize this, she promised to clean The Lands and keep Elwood alive. She may came across monsters who will try to stop her but she wont gave up.

 Elwood ismindeki bu sihirli ağaç yavaşça ölmeye başlamıştı. Bunu fark eden Alder, The Lands’leri temizleyerek Elwood’u hayatta tutacağına söz verdi. Karşısına onu durdurmaya çalışacak canavarlar olsa bile bu onu durdurmayacak.

OYUNU ACMAK ICIN `TübitakProjectOne.exe` adli dosyayi acarak oynayabilirsiniz

YOU CAN PLAY by opening the file named of `TübitakProjectOne.exe` 

Movement: WASD - SPACE

Hareket: WASD - SPACE

Note: You can restart your current level by pressing the R button.

Not: R'ye basarak bulundugunuz leveli yeniden baslatabilirsiniz

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR TUBITAK PROJECT

BU OYUN TUBITAK PROJESI ICIN YAPILMISTIR

IN DEVELOPMENT

Team:

2D Artist - Begum Hacioglu

Programmer - Omer Tuna Ocal

Designer - Halil Ersoy

Voice Actors = Kadrihan Azbay / Begum Hacioglu

Extra - Hamza Demirci
